abstract: Can you unravel this mathematical challenge — a tournament teaser by the physicist Marco Moriconi?
snippet: Can you unravel this mathematical challenge — a tournament teaser by the physicist Marco Moriconi?
lead_paragraph: This week’s challenge — timed to coincide with the final few days of this year’s Australian Open tennis tournament — was suggested by Marco Moriconi, a regular Numberplay contributor and professor of physics at the Universidade Federal Fluminense, in Niteroi, Rio de Janeiro. (Dr. Moriconi also writes a monthly math column for the Brazilian national science magazine, Ciência Hoje (Science Today), called Qual o Problema, or “What’s the Problem?”)
